Pre-workshop reading

Read "Arguing through Archival Objects: A Z-Axis Method for 3-D-Printed Interpretation."

Familiarize yourself with the plot and characters of Djuna Barnes's Nightwood (1936).

Familiarize yourself with the plot and characters of Virginia Woolf's Mrs. Dalloway (1925).

Required software

Download and install a copy of Autodesk Mudbox for educational purposes.

Access the z-axis tool at zaxis.uvic.ca.
